title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go        Minuteman Missile National Historic Site Visitor Center at dusk on a late autumn afternoon NPS/Chris Wilkinson   Â    Three places allow visitors a unique opportunity to better understand the history of Minuteman Missiles on the Great Plains and the broader history of the Cold War:  Start your visit at the Visitor Center Ranger led tours take visitors behind the blast door at the Delta-01 Launch Control Facility  Visit the Launch Facility (Missile Silo) Delta-09   Most visitors spend several hours exploring the visitor center and one or both of the sites.
